adiyara dekakin samanwithawa ha kandayam ataka sahabhagithwayak athiwa mahanuwara bogambara kridanganaye pasugiya sathiye pawathi palamu adiyara jayagrahanaya kala pasugiya wasare shurathawa dinu shri lanka telikom mobitel eegals pila prasada lakunu 30k athkara thibu athara ehidi prasada lakunu 25k sahithawa softlojik woriyars pila dewana sthanayeda prasada lakunu 21k laba gath aksas kings pila thewani sthanayeda pasuwuha.ehi awasan tharagayedi shri lanka mobitel eegals pila lakunu 19-05k lesa softlojik woriyars pila parajayata path kaleya.

sanwardhana katayuthuwala pawathina adupadu penwa demin ee pilibandawa baladharinge awadhanaya yomukara wimata wagakiwa yuthu madhya aayathanayak lesa apa nirantharayen katayuthu karanawa.me penwa denne mahajana mudal apathe yawamin rathnapura - niwithigala pradeshaye sidukala wyapruthiyak pilibandawayi.rathnapura - niwithigala - kiribathgala pra deshaye janathawage hisata sewanak sakasadime aramunin pasugiya rajaya samaye poronduwu  wathu niwasa wyapruthiya aarambha wanne 2006 wasarediyi.kiribathgala wathu palaka mandalaye adhikshanaya yatathe jathika niwasa sanwardhana adhikariya mema wyapruthiya aarambha kale ema wathuyaye dilindu pawul 25 k sandaha niwasa labadima sandahayi.ema janathawage niwasa sihinaya yatharthayak kirime aramunin aarambha wana ema niwasa yojana kramaye ada thaththwayayi me.

piduru godagahala dawas hatharak,pahak yanakota piduru walata jalaya,pinna watenna gaththama...athule ushnathwaya hondatama wadiwenna gaththama me piduru hathu ankura hadenna gannawa.aththatama me ankura hatiyata thamayi mewa aaharayata ganne.
‘ho chi min’, wiyatnamaye wishalathama nagaraya.
me palath sabha pradesha thunehi shri lankawe mulu janagahanayen hatharen ekak wasaya karayi.

subha pathum bassi...thawa thawa liyanna shakthiya dhairyaya labewa..!
ee wadan kriyathmaka kirimata ita gaththeya.
